sentences.sContent: His every utterance will be scrutinized.
sentences.sCn: 他说的每句话都会被细查。

sentences.sContent: ...walk-throughs of every day of my life from waking to sleeping...
...A handful of people can recall almost every day of their lives in enormous detail—and after years of research...
...A very small number of people are able to remember almost every detail of their life...
...I could tell you everything about every day after that...
...Imagine being able to remember every painting, on every wall, in every gallery space...
...all that was every exciting with new things coming out...
...she claimed that she could recall every day of her life since the age of 12...
...I’ve broken eggs at every stage of the process—from the very beginning to the very...
...We now use some of these objects every day...

phrases.pCn: 所有其他的；每隔一个的
